channel.title: Fishing
channel.description: I'm trying to add a fishing location to my skilling area but how can i do it? Are fishing spots Global Objects? Are Fishing Spots NPC's? Please could someone just tell me what i need to add for a fishing location please. Also could someone tell me the ID's?

item.title: Fishing
item.dc:creator: @alancarr123 alancarr123
item.description:
@alancarr123 wrote:

Thanks Chassy

Read full topic

item.title: Fishing
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

You can find the IDs either on the MoparScape client, a client with a list, or just by searching. Fishing spots are NPCs, and they will need to be added to the NPC Click One packet to function.

Read full topic
